CalculationMatrixRow.name: CalculationMatrixRow
CalculationMatrixRow.description: Defines a row in a Decision Matrix. The label for this object is Decision Matrix Row.

CalculationMatrixVersionId.description: The ID of the Decision Matrix Version to which this row belongs.

EndDateTime.description: The last date on which this row version is active. Applicable if IsVersionEnabled is true.

InputData.description: The input columns and associated values for this row of the matrix.

IsVersionEnabled.description: Specifies whether the associated matrix version is active. Derived from the associated Decision Matrix Version (CalculationMatrixVersion object).

OutputData.description: The output columns and associated values for this row of the matrix.

StartDateTime.description: The first date on which this row version is active. Applicable if IsVersionEnabled is true.
